From: David McLean <Davidm@advantagestyling.com.au>
Subject: RE: Tweaks to the payment pages

To: Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au>

Hi Heath,
Thanks for doing the changes. Everything is looking good except for the payment cards. They haven't been changed. They should look like this with no hover overs. I see the Hover overs are gone, but there is still a hover over. See a photo I took (below the payment cards)

PAY UP FRONT
- Pay with Credit Card or EFT

- - Use our secure payment gateway to pay by credit card or elect to pay by EFT
-

-

-

Total $5,000
PAY LATER
- Allows you to pay for your Styling and any Trades work completed by Advantage Projects at settlement, or 180 days (whichever comes sooner).
-
- Nothing payable upfront
- No monthly payments
- Fees as low as 2.9%
- Super easy online application
Up front: $0
At settlement*: $5,295
<image002.png>

*includes Service Fee of $295 based on a 3 month loan period, i.e. 5.9%
PAY ON SUCCESS
- Style now, but only pay if you sell. A 20% up front service and risk protection fee is payable.
-
- No monthly payments
- Super easy online application
- Up to 12 months to sell and 6 months to settle
-
-
Up front: $1,000
At settlement*: $5,000
If you don't sell: $0.00

One final tweak. Could we change the word "and" (circled) to "to"

Thanks
David

From: Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Thursday, 5 August 2021 2:08 PM

Subject: Re: Tweaks to the payment pages

On 4 Aug 2021, at 11:02 pm, David McLean <davidm@advantagestyling.com.au> wrote:

Hi Heath,
Thanks for the work you've done so far on the quote platform.
Can I ask you to make a few minor adjustments.
1/ The first is we want to delete all the hover overs and amend the payment cards to the following.
PAY UP FRONT
- Pay with Credit Card or EFT
- Use our secure payment gateway to pay by credit card or elect to pay by EFT
-
-
-
-

-

Total $5,000
PAY LATER
- Allows you to pay for your Styling and any Trades work completed by Advantage Projects at settlement, or 180 days (whichever comes sooner).
- Nothing payable upfront
- No monthly payments
- Fees as low as 2.9%
- Super easy online application
Up front: $0
At settlement*: $5,295
<image002.png>

*includes Service Fee of $295 based on a 3 month loan period, i.e. 5.9%
PAY ON SUCCESS
- Style now, but only pay if you sell. A 20% up front service and risk protection fee is payable.
- No monthly payments
- Super easy online application
- Up to 1.5 years to pay
-
-
-
-
Up front: $1,000
At settlement*: $5,000
If you don't sell: $0.00
Heath, please disregard the blue arrow here. I copied the boxes and couldn't remove it
2/ Under the Contact phone field it says "Same as Styling address?"
Can we amend it to "Your Address - same as styling address? Yes/no buttons as you have it to produce an address box.
Can we delete the address ID box
3/ If I click accept on the Pay Later or Pay on Success pop up, it takes you back to the payment card. Could we have it so that it takes you to the "Enter Personal and Contract details" so the customer doesn't have to scroll down
4/ If someone selects a payment card (eg pay upfront) the screen stays still and the payment card is highlighted in gold. Because it doesn't scroll down for the customer, they may be tempted to hit the payment card again, thinking nothing has happened. If they do, it then reverts back 2 steps and displays the accept proposal button again. It has the potential to frustrate customers who are feeling they are in a loop.
In addition, are we able to delete the random accept proposal button that appears below the payment cards when you select a payment card option (the second time)
Call me if I haven't explained that well
5/ At the very bottom, after they have signed the contract there is a green button that says "Submit". Can we change that to "accept proposal"
6/ I have made minor tweaks to the Pay Later pop up (attached) if you could amend
7/ In the Pay On Success pop up, can we capitalise the words Commitment Period (It's a definition word for the provider). Can we make the red and green buttons visible in the pop up without the customer having to scroll down
8/ For anyone who selects Pay Later or Pay on Success, where there is a bond in the quote, we would want them to be processed exactly as they are now with a bond on Pay Later with our current Pay Later provider - Elevare.
The bond would not appear on Pay upfront
The process would be
  • They would choose either Pay Later, or Pay on Success and then the box below should appear please change the word Elevare to CampaignFlow)
<image006.png>
  • then the credit card fields should appear for completion
  • complete the personal and contract details
  • Sign the contract
  • Tick the t's and c's
  • Accept proposal and be redirected to Campaign Flow
9/ Can you search the words Pay On Success for anywhere in the pop ups or on the platform and ensure anywhere it appears that it has a capital P, O and S at the start of each word
10/ Can you search the word Campaign Flow for anywhere in the pop ups or on the platform. Anywhere it appears, can we ensure it is one word with a capital F - CampaignFlow
11/ Can we adjust it that if you accept the proposal button at the top right, it then scrolls down immediately to the payment fields
Thanks Heath
Kind Regards,
David McLean
General Manager
Advantage Property Styling
